website_summaries.verdict: A simple choice for adding a light to your ceiling fan. Three-light design limits the amount of bulbs required, saving time and energy when it comes time to install.
pros: Great light coverage from the three angled lights
Shades add a slight tint in the color that helps to illuminate the room
cons: Installation can be complicated depending on the type and brand of the fan

customer_reviews.title: NOT compatible with Westinghouse's own fans!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Westinghouse 7871400 Contrempra fan. As all too usual Westinghouse shoves the candalebra light kit down your throat. OK, fine, I'll pony up for a light kit that supports a15/a19 bulbs. But, NO. Westinghouse's 3-LED light kit is 100% NOT compatible in any way with the Westinghouse fan. No warning of course. No, you can't tell from the picture because they cleverly hide the 2-screw system that will not fit into the 3-screw fan housing. Even if you get past that the light kit is precisely machined NOT to fit in the ceiling fan light kit housing. Fah. I hate you.
customer_reviews.author: marvo

customer_reviews.title: Brushed brass can be hard to find
customer_reviews.text: We bought a house with 12 ceiling fans! Most of them brushed brass, which we’ll live with for the time being. Only one was lacking a light kit and they are hard to find in this finish. I laughed, but gave ease of installation 5 stars. Installation should have been very straightforward, but we ended up having to take the entire fan down because there was no power to the wiring for the light kit. This was not the fault of the light kit, but recommend anyone adding a light, rather than replacing, check for power so you don’t have to do everything two or three times like we did.
customer_reviews.author: akm

customer_reviews.title: Center mount. Not for three/four hole
customer_reviews.text: This light mounts directly to the existing center hole in the "light delete cap" on your ceiling fan. THIS IS NOT FOR THREE HOLE MOUNTING APPLICATIONS. if your fan already has a light that is connected with three of four screws, this will not work for you without using the original "light delete" cap that came on/with your fan If your existing fan has a small capped (3/8 ?) punch out in the center of the light delete cap you can use it to connect this fixture. It uses a short threaded tube to connect it and run the wiring through to your existing cap
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO good lighting at all
customer_reviews.text: We originally had the globe-like light. NO good lighting at all. We absolutely LOVE our new Westinghouse LED Cluster Ceiling Light!! So much more lighting in our family room and so much more attractive!! Thanks Amazon we can always depend on you to carry GREAT products!! We are ordering 2 more for other rooms in our home!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Burgess

customer_reviews.title: So much better now!
customer_reviews.text: The ceiling fan in my room is antique bronze but the light kit on it was brass and so dated and ugly that I finally couldn’t stand it any longer. This matches perfectly and is a little more of a classic style. It took me a few minutes to sort out which way the wires went and that the adapter plate needed to be on but then it all connected pretty smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: NerdGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We didn't want to replace the entire ceiling fan, but the light unit on the fan was so dim. So we decided to order this and see if it worked. It was easy to replace and is much brighter than what we had. It worked so well, we bought another for another fan in another bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Westinghouse fan with the single candelabra bulb. We wanted the three regular base bulbs so we bought the Westinghouse replacement light kit. The kit did not work. I tried to contact Westinghouse by email and got no response. Using a 20 ton press we were able to adapt the kit to fit the fan. The directions with this kit are not helpful at all. I would not recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Colussy

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product that performs as excepted
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product that performs as excepted. The only problem I encountered was when I dropped the product and two of the insulators on the bulb holders broke. Westinghouse was no help in resolving the replacement of the broken parts so I ordered a second unit. I was able to find replacement bulb holders at Home Depot for $2.50 each and used the repaired unit on a second fan.
customer_reviews.author: RonnieB

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition for the money
customer_reviews.text: This was the best non OEM light kit I could fine for my Hunter fan. Not sure how old the fan is but this matched up fine to the bottom of the fans light cover for the wiring. I removed the metal plate covering the wires and placed the two screws back in place screwed almost all of the way down.. the light fixture simply went over the address and turned slightly to hold it in place after connecting the two wires. 15 minute project..
customer_reviews.author: m. a. spears

customer_reviews.title: Good product, didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It was a used product but it was about 50% off. I thought, well, why not try it? The biggest problem with the ceiling fan light kit is it does not work with my ceiling fan. One of the three globes was broken too, but I would have kept the kit and got a new globe. I returned it, but it was a good quality product, except for the broken globe.
customer_reviews.author: BKB

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit my ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these. The base was very small. If you bought your fan at Home Depot, go there to get a replacement light kit. They are in the fan sections with the glass ceiling fan globes and fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: It is a light kit.
customer_reviews.text: It is a standard light kit for a ceiling fan. It is not overly attractive; it looks just like the picture. Don't expect to dress up your room; it's really kind of plain. But it does exactly what you need a light kit to do. Installation is as easy as any other light kit. Connect the wires to the ones under your fan and turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Allan R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: A bit of a struggle to install, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I like the appearance and brightness of the fixture; a wonderful improvement over my old light fixture
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: LED bulbs included!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this to replace a defective light on our ceiling fan. Awesome that "light bulbs (LED) included."
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit. Took no time to install. Looks great to
customer_reviews.author: Charles F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I didn;t find any noticeable defects. No problem installing it.
customer_reviews.author: Domingo

customer_reviews.title: decent light for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, used for a ceiling fan light with 60 watt Led bulbs. Really lights up the room.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Olivier

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Kit
customer_reviews.text: Old ceiling fan light kit replacement. Good bang for the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Oemytech

customer_reviews.title: Fits older fans
customer_reviews.text: Had an older fan with center mount. Fit and worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, gives nice soft light
customer_reviews.text: This did not come on time, and was a huge bummer in that regard because it was Prime shipping, but it installed nicely and gives nice light in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Carr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The handy man had it up in 5 minutes. It is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Paine

customer_reviews.title: Great replacenment.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for our 35 year old light. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Owens

customer_reviews.title: Hooking up the wiring
customer_reviews.text: I had a frosted globe with 2 candles lights witch wasn't much light and the fact that I smuck it up. With the Westinghouse light fixture with 3 lights and easy installation and a whole lot more lighting it was worth changing the lights over
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easily installed. Clear instructions. A big improvement to my existing ceiling fans.
customer_reviews.author: D D

customer_reviews.title: Broken globes.
customer_reviews.text: The globes came broken. We returned it for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Roche

customer_reviews.title: Useful light
customer_reviews.text: The light was as advertised. The installation was easy as the holes were spaced correctly for my Hunter fan. My only criticism is the retention for the shades is by set screw instead of a collar.
customer_reviews.author: User 22

customer_reviews.title: Great asset for our fan
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and very easy to install. Would buy again if needed✌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Brinkley B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked well for my two fans that didn't come with lights.
customer_reviews.author: Anders

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install on my existing fan
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on existing fan to add LED bulbs
customer_reviews.author: Tina Farquhar

customer_reviews.title: one of glass shades came in broken. i had ...
customer_reviews.text: one of glass shades came in broken. i had to use it for my rental home because there was no way to get one shade separately. i will have to order a new one and replace the existing one to return...
customer_reviews.author: Young C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Matched nice to my older fan. Works good and adds a lot more light.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I loved this but I couldn't install it myself and and my backwards husband wouldn't try. Even though I could tell him step by step how
customer_reviews.author: felicia barrett

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty I do like it but could be little better quality
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Had to modify to fit my housing for the revering switch and the fan pull switch. Otherwise works well and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mings

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works well! Brightens up the kitchen very well!
customer_reviews.author: champion04

customer_reviews.title: Fan lights
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what was offered , although the weight made the fan unbalanced..
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install , arrived as agreed works great .
customer_reviews.author: Harlyn Shook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Though the unit was fine, it was too small in diameter for my ceiling fan. So not usable
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: It said on the box that it was a universal ...
customer_reviews.text: It said on the box that it was a universal part that worked with most Westinghouse ceiling fans. I had a late model Westinghouse fan and it would not attach.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Lyle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came with one bulb cover broken. Had to buy one from home depot.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas

customer_reviews.title: very nicely made but had to return as it was a ...
customer_reviews.text: very nicely made but had to return as it was a fitting for a fan which I did not need. I needed a light fixture alone. My error and it looked very nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work but the package was accidentally thrown away so I can't return it :/
customer_reviews.author: Red_Sky

product_meta.title: Westinghouse Lighting 7784800 Three LED Cluster Ceiling Fan Light Kit, Antique Brass Finish with Frosted Ribbed Glass, 1 Pack, White
product_meta.description: Westinghouse 7784800 Cluster Ceiling Fan 3-Light LED Kit 15 Total Watts, Antique Brass
feature_bullets: Energy-efficient light kit adds a traditional accent to any Ceiling Fan
Classic Antique brass finish with frosted ribbed glass shades
Fits most light-kit-adaptable 42-inch to 52-inch indoor Ceiling fans with a center hole in the housing cap
Three energy-saving LED Omni a15 bulbs are equivalent to three 40-watt incandescent bulbs, but use only 5-watts each
Includes three non-dimmable LED light bulbs, installation instructions and mounting hardware

specifications.Included Components: Light Kit with LED light bulbs
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
